channel.title: Any1 doing The Impossible Mission?
channel.description: Posts in the discussion thread "Any1 doing The Impossible Mission?"

item.title: Re: Any1 doing The Impossible Mission?
item.content:encoded:
I copied this list from the official BvS forum, there is a thread on the Village Relations board there dedicated to villages doing the IM. A few of them have exploded already but take a look at them.

  1. Tuesday, with 24 vacancies.
  2. Icicle, with 33 vacancies.
  3. Shi Kai, with 28 vacancies.
  4. NeoTokyo, with 3 vacancies.
  5. Syndicate, with 28 vacancies.
  6. Arcadia, with 22 vacancies.
  7. Steam, with 32 vacancies.
  8. Sigma, with 28 vacancies.
  9. Shinogobmi, BOOM!!!
  10. Delerium, with 20 vacancies.
  11. Jeuno, with 23 vacancies.
  12. Omerta, with 14 vacancies.
  13. Tesla , with 37 vacancies.
  14. Zuiichi , with 0 vacancies.
  15. Champloo, with 29 vacancies.
  16. NapalmLuck, with 29 vacancies.
  17. Desolate, with 23 vacancies.

item.title: Any1 doing The Impossible Mission?
item.content:encoded: just wondering if any1 is doing it i would love to join ur village for the perm just leave village name if ur doing it or plan to soon
